author: cbs8
title: StarGifts.com Offers The Ultimate Personalized Gifts For All Occasions
text:
StarGifts
Major Movie, Sports, TV and Music Licenses, including Maze Runner, One Direction, Dr. Who and More, Provide Unique Gifts for Any Interest
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Anyone looking for the perfect gift now has a new online destination to find the latest and most unique personalized products available â€“ StarGifts.com . StarGifts' products are officially licensed by top pop stars, movies, TV shows and sports teams from around the world.
From One Direction , Maze Runner (the current #1 movie in America) and Doctor Who, to the most popular football teams in England including Manchester United and Arsenal, StarGifts features products that allow the "giftor" to create personalized gifts with digitally printed messages in an exact and official copy of their favorite stars' actual handwriting and signature. As the only gift company in the world offering this level of personalization, the products on StarGifts.com are totally unique.
To add further personalization, many StarGifts products allow the customer to include their own picture or name on the product. StarGifts.com's preview user interface allows the customer to see exactly what they're buying before committing to the purchase.
Products available on StarGifts include mugs, photos and posters, phone cases, shirts, art, greeting cards, clocks, customized newspaper headlines and more. StarGifts ships its products anywhere in the world and has a 100 percent satisfaction guarantee. Additional licenses available on StarGifts include John Wayne , David Hasselhof (yes, the Hoff!), Ricky Martin , Top Gear, Better Call Saul, Baywatch, Impact Wrestling and many more.
"If you know someone who is a fan of the singers, actors, movies, shows or sports teams featured on StarGifts, there is no better present than to receive a personalized gift that is perfect for them," said Paul Harris , CEO of StarGifts. "Our roster of products is great for the holidays, birthdays, graduation, or any occasion where you want to give a completely unique gift."
About StarGifts.com
StarGifts.com is the world's leading online destination for creating personalized gifts for all occasions. StarGifts products feature personal messages in an exact and official copy of stars actual handwriting and signature. All StarGifts.com products are licensed from the official management companies or agents of the celebrities, sports personalities, entertainers, musicians, artists, actors and actresses who appear on the site. For more information please visit www.StarGifts.com .
For Media Inquiries, contact :
